synopsis.text: Yoshioka Futaba was an attractive and popular middle school student who was ostracized by her female classmates due to jealousy over her popularity with boys. She had feelings for her gentle classmate Tanaka Kou, but before she could confess he suddenly transferred schools without explanation. Now in high school, Futaba is determined to avoid standing out. She acts tomboyish and unkempt so other girls won't be jealous of her looks. However, her world turns upside-down when she encounters her first love again, now going by the name Mabuchi Kou. He has undergone changes himself, becoming more distant and charismatic. As Futaba tries to reconnect with Kou and understand the mysteries behind his disappearance and transformation, she risks losing the normal life she had rebuilt for herself. Yet she can't let go of this second chance at love, even if rekindling it may mean sacrificing new friendships. Futaba must decide if her feelings for Kou are worth upending her high school experience once more.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
